testcase.name: Book a Roundtrip flight with a promotion code
testcase.system-out: Given I am on United Airlines Home page.....................................passed And I click on the DEALS option.............................................passed When I clicked on Flights to Orlando link...................................passed Then I should land to a new windows tab with bread cramp end with "Flights to Orlando".passed When I enter a departure city and destination city..........................passed And I selected the departure and return dates...............................passed And I selected travel info class of travel and number of travelers..........passed When I entered the promotion code "1239865721"..............................passed And I click on the Search Flights button....................................passed Then I should see a text "We could not process your request. Please see the message below and make revisions.".passed
